title: Trump’s Economic Agenda Hinges on the Supreme Court’s Tariff Ruling

title: Happy 10th Birthday to the Laser Interferometer Gravitational-Wave Observatory. Now Drop Dead.
summary: Ten years ago, astronomers made an epic discovery with the Laser Interferometer Gravitational-Wave Observatory. Cosmology hasn’t been the same since, and it might not stay that way much longer.

title: Mexico City Gas Explosion Injures at Least 58, With 19 Badly Burned

title: Rosa Roisinblit, Who Championed the Missing in Argentina, Dies at 106
